topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e68f4c6368722774a71d00#post_54e68f4c6368722774a71d00
The answer to that question is easily... maybe.
I don't actually know because it's been an eternity and a half since I've seen any Gundam. But he might be better off, even if only slightly.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e68f4c6368722774a71d00#post_54e68f4c6368722774a71d00

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e68fd86368722adcf41500#post_54e68fd86368722adcf41500
Well I would think it would go better for him only _if_ the character's changed too.

Like keep White Haired pretty man there too! But change EVERYONE else. And make his Dad die like in the first three episodes. 

Because honestly the only thing Shinji really needs is for people to believe in him and actually care, which most of the EVA cast didn't except for like two people and they both died.
topics.author: 50c204917f123b31440000a5

topics.body:
"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e690ec6368724913850500#post_54e690ec6368724913850500
You know, I like to think that Shinji and Simon are the same character, with one crucial difference: Simon had someone who believed in him, while Shinji didn't.
topics.author: 5043cdb47f123b72cc0032d3

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e6920b6368727abbb72900#post_54e6920b6368727abbb72900
Honestly I can believe that.

Like, Just swap both the characters universe wise and see what happens.

Put Shinji in the LAGANN universe and watch as he gets the biggest badass confidence boost no man has ever seen before! 

And then put Simon in the EVA universe and watch as, well, everything turns into shit thanks to people that are legit assholes.
